problem.markdown:
Post-Quiz ===== Identify the correct order in which the nodes are specified in SPICE for a mosfet ( ) Gate Source Drain Bulkterminal (x) Drain Gate Source Bulkterminal ( ) Bulkterinal Source Gate Drain ( ) None of the above
Which of the following is not a part of the SPICE input file? ( ) Data statement ( ) Control statement ( ) Output statement (x) Behavourial statement
What does this indicate .DC Vds 0 5 0.5 Vgs 0 5 1? (x) the voltage Vds will be swept from 0 to 5V in steps of 1V for every value of Vgs. ( ) he voltage Vgs will be swept from 0 to 5V in steps of 1V for every value of Vds. () ( ) he voltage Vds will be swept from 0 to 1V in steps of 5V for every value of Vgs. ( ) none of them
What are the analysis done to obtain the graphs for the experiments done so far? ( ) DC analysis ( ) transient (x) both of them ( ) None of them
Which statement is false about declaration of capacitor in SPICE ( ) the positive node is followed by the negative node in declsration (x) there is no way to specify intial condition ( ) both of the above ( ) none of the above
Among the following which of the analysis can neither be printed nor plotted ( ) .DC (x) .NOISE ( ) .TRAN ( ) .AC
The file extension which is not generated by spice? ( ) .tr0 ( ) .st0 ( ) .ic (x) none of the above
What analysis should be performed to study variation of voltage over time? ( ) .op (x) .tran ( ) .dc ( ) .sens
Which of the following statement is false? ( ) First statement of a spice code is a comment ( ) Comments in spice begin with * (x) Comments in spice begin with # ( ) None of the above
What is the PC version of spice called? ( ) HSPICE (x) PSPICE ( ) TSPICE ( ) NSPICE
problem.p: Identify the correct order in which the nodes are specified in SPICE for a mosfet
Which of the following is not a part of the SPICE input file?
What does this indicate .DC Vds 0 5 0.5 Vgs 0 5 1?

he voltage Vgs will be swept from 0 to 5V in steps of 1V for every value of Vds. ()
he voltage Vds will be swept from 0 to 1V in steps of 5V for every value of Vgs.

there is no way to specify intial condition
